Reviews.Title: Great laptop for the price!
Reviews.Author: matthew mcclure
Reviews.Content: After countless browsing for a laptop under $500, this laptop had the most bang for the buck. It's simple, sleek, and pretty powerful. I recommend this laptop to anyone who is looking for a laptop that can do the basics and some light gaming. Only downside is the keyboard isn't lit, other than that it's a great laptop. It came fast as well, I ordered on a Wed. morning, and came Friday afternoon.

Reviews.Title: So far....
Reviews.Author: Nicole
Reviews.Content: I purchased this laptop under the impression that it was a brand new, never been opened computer, since no where on the listing does it say used. However, I did indeed receive a used laptop that I can't even use because the previous owner has a password on his user profile. I am rating this a three until I hear back from Amazon to get this issue resolved. Overall, the laptop seems nice from the looks of it and the profile screen...all I can judge from at the moment.

Reviews.Title: awesome!
Reviews.Author: Joe C.
Reviews.Content: Fast, fast, fast! Great laptop! I researched over 300 laptops! Best price best value the processor is remarkable! I recommend this for almost any type of user!

Reviews.Title: Bad Wifi and Sleep mode issues
Reviews.Author: Gael Silvestre
Reviews.Content: The compute go to sleep every 5 minutes, eventhought I changed the setting to "never go to sleep". Doesn't get the Wifi correctly.

Reviews.Title: NOT best bang for the buck!
Reviews.Author: Brian Shepherd
Reviews.Content: the 59406400 model with the A10 processor 2.5-3.5ghz is the same price right now..I have both of these on my wish list just to see how they do
